taconite.replaceContent:
As the cost of living increases, and real wages stay the same, more and more people are staying in and cooking at home. There is nothing more romantic than a couple who prepairs food together. These are just a few of the reasons offered as to why get your knives sharpened.
We are offering sharpening expertly done for $3 a knife.
Minimum $30 order.
Check what services we cover.
